json.text: This IELTS Speaking question is about history. Do you like to learn about
history? I absolutely do, yes. I'm kind of a history nerd, and I always
have been. My grandfather and my dad were also into history as well, so I think
that probably rubbed off on me. I'm especially interested in World War two,
so I visit World War two museums (whenever*) I get a chance and I often
stumble upon interesting historical articles on Wikipedia or on news
websites and I always end up reading them. There are a lot of other areas of
history that I'd like to learn more about, but there's seemingly so much that
I don't really know where to start. Want more? Check out MarkTeacher.com for
more IELTS courses lessons and tips!
